--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Otyebis Staff:
> 
> 
> 
> The soldiers stopped at a hallway.  One of the soldiers turned to 
Khonkolor.  
> "Matches are still going on, so we don't know who you shall be 
fighting.  Hot 
> Rod and Epyon both won their matches so they should be near by.  We 
will 
> allow you to use your comm. system to communicate them.  These 
hallways lead 
> to your quarters, an area to be repaired and recharged, etc."
> 
> The soldiers walked away.
